classic.name: Caesar Cipher
classic.description: Decrypt a message encoded with a Caesar cipher, where each letter is shifted a certain number of places down the alphabet.

classic.name: Transposition Cipher
classic.description: Decrypt a message where the positions held by units of plaintext are shifted according to a regular system.

modern.name: AES Encryption
modern.description: Decrypt a message encrypted with Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) which uses symmetric key encryption.

modern.name: 3DES Encryption
modern.description: Decrypt a message encrypted with Triple Data Encryption Algorithm (3DES) which uses symmetric-key block cipher.

modern.name: RC4 Encryption
modern.description: Decrypt a message encrypted with Rivest Cipher 4 (RC4) which is a stream cipher.

modern.name: Twofish Encryption
modern.description: Decrypt a message encrypted with Twofish which is a symmetric key block cipher.

challenges.name: Mixed Cipher Challenge
challenges.description: Decrypt a message that has been encrypted using a combination of different ciphers.

example.encrypted: Encrypted message with multiple layers of encryption

challenges.name: Unknown Cipher Challenge
challenges.description: Identify and decrypt a message where the encryption method is unknown.
